extendedInfo.description: Track the project status from your Microsoft project plan easily on the go.  Simply download the mpp file from your email and save it on your smartphone. Just by clicking on explorer button on this app it will scan the existing mpp files on your smart phone for you to access your Microsoft Project filesFrom the main screen you can easily access to Resources, Quick project info etc.You can use this app for:Track the tasks on one place across the projectTrack the overall project statusTrack the project from resource levelTrack the project from the task levelTrack unlimited mpp files for free..Please write to us at info@contus.in so that we can enhance this product with more features

reviews.title: Good, but written in American
reviews.comment: It\'s a very good starter, but not everybody on the planet puts dates the wrong way round like the Americans. Some of us can spell, so we need a variable to change the date to the CORRECT way round.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs a lot of work
reviews.comment: On the plus side its the only free app out there that can actually read an mpp file, however: -The apps file functionality needs a lots work: 1. Include a file explorer 2. If I try to open an MPP from an explorer it doesn\'t know to use this program to open it. Does not even show up in the menu to select a default program. -Finally I am not sure how it looks on a smartphone but the graphics and layout rules need lots of work for a tablet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better
reviews.comment: I can\'t say this as a best one but the app works slightly good. Need some changes to shine as a best one.
reviews.author: Vinoth Kumar

reviews.title: Installs, can\'t find MPP files, hangs.  End of story.
reviews.comment: As the Stones said in 19th Nervous Breakdown \"Ain\'t nuthin\' I do don\'t seem to work...  only seems to make matters worse...\" - - :-(  So I hereby (after about half an hour trying to get it to find or open my tested & proven MPP file)  am uninstalling this from my Asus Transformer 101.  A waste of time.
reviews.author: Michael Greer

reviews.title: Ads are a spoiler
reviews.comment: Probably ok, but ads popping up from the second the app gets started. Deinstalled right away. I rather prefer to pay than getting annoyed all the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problem Solved, now you can open the file
reviews.comment: Guys don\'t copy MPP files to external SD card instead use device default memory then this APP will work. Developers please provide the scan option to external sd card. For free this really worth it. Support developers !!! Cheers !!!
reviews.author: Muzaffar Shah Khan

reviews.title: Great Application! Peter is an Idiot..
reviews.comment: +Peter, @Peter,   you are an idiot... First off you sound quite unintelligent when you say \"its written in american\". and secondly, how is the way Americans write a date, the \"Incorrect\" way? Maybe the dev made it that way because your way is the \"Incorrect\" way. Ever think of that? Plus, by writing the date in the way Americans write it, how does that mean that Americans can not spell? That doesn\'t even make sense..  Because for one, writing a date isn\'t spelling. Spelling is for Words, not letters, unless of coarse you are spelling the letter; One, Two, Three, etc.  Cant believe you have the top comment, your a moron..  Plus you think it helps to talk bad about the way Americans spell, or write dates, yet you probably don\'t realize the Developer is probably American as well. I\'m sure talking bad about his ways is really going to help you.  Go to your countries app market and get your own Foreign enhanced MPP viewer.   But this application really is great. I am loving it.  And I could care less how the Date is formatted, Its not something to throw a fit about.  Thanks Dev!
reviews.author: A Google User
